channel.title: CVE Feed for Wpexpertsio -- WC Shop Sync – Integrate Square and WooCommerce for Seamless Shop Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wpexpertsio -- WC Shop Sync – Integrate Square and WooCommerce for Seamless Shop Management

item.title: CVE-2024-27959|2024-03-17T16:27:35.031Z -- Wpexpertsio -- WC Shop Sync – Integrate Square and WooCommerce for Seamless Shop Management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Wpexpertsio WC Shop Sync – Integrate Square and WooCommerce for Seamless Shop Management allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WC Shop Sync – Integrate Square and WooCommerce for Seamless Shop Management: from n/a through 4.2.9.
